objective: how to generate a deep search tool

sub_tasks.task: Define the specific use case for the deep search tool.
Research existing deep search algorithms and technologies.
Identify key features required in the deep search tool.
Explore data sources and types the tool will search through.
Determine the architecture for the deep search tool.
Investigate user interface and experience design for the tool.
Analyze security and privacy considerations for the tool.
Consider integration with existing systems or platforms.
Research potential challenges and limitations in building the tool.
Identify potential partners or collaborators for development.
